dochas_west_gate.name: the town gate
dochas_west_gate.description: Standing just over head-high, the Dochas West Gate is a feeble attempt at keeping out intruders.

dochas_south_gate.name: the town gate
dochas_south_gate.description: Standing just over head-high, the Dochas South Gate is a feeble attempt at keeping out intruders.

dochas_leatherworks_door.name: Dochas Leatherworks door
dochas_leatherworks_door.description: You see a rickety door, worn by years of use.

dochas_smallhouse_gate.name: a gate
dochas_smallhouse_gate.description: You see a small gate leading to the doorstep of the house.

dochas_smallhouse_door.name: a door
dochas_smallhouse_door.description: You see a front door of the small house, which fits awkwardly in the doorjam.

edgwood_forest_path.name: a path
edgwood_forest_path.description: You see an unassuming path meant for foot traffic through the woods.

stool.name: a sturdy stool
stool.description: A small stool sits on the ground.

kobold_corpse.name: a dead kobold
kobold_corpse.description: The kill looks fresh. You may want to search it for loot before someone else does.

goblin_corpse.name: a dead goblin
goblin_corpse.description: The kill looks fresh. You may want to search it for loot before someone else does.

wild_boar_corpse.name: a body of a wild boar
wild_boar_corpse.description: The kill looks fresh. You may want to search it for loot before someone else does.
